statements: SELECT customer_name, email FROM customer_information WHERE age > 30
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, address FROM customer_information WHERE age BETWEEN 25 AND 35
SELECT * FROM customer_information WHERE phone_number LIKE '%123456%'
SELECT customer_name, preferences FROM customer_information WHERE age < 30 ORDER BY customer_name ASC
SELECT customer_name, address, phone_number FROM customer_information WHERE email LIKE '%example.com%'
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM customer_information WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, address FROM customer_information WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM customer_information WHERE preferences->>'category' = 'food' AND age < 40 ORDER BY customer_id;
SELECT MAX(age), MIN(age), AVG(age) FROM customer_information WHERE address LIKE '%Avenue%';
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM customer_information WHERE customer_name LIKE 'J%' OR address LIKE '%Street%';
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM customers ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT customer_id, email FROM customers WHERE created_at >= '2022-01-01' AND created_at <= '2022-01-31';
SELECT customer_id, preference_name, preference_value FROM preferences INNER JOIN customers ON preferences.customer_id = customers.customer_id;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE last_name = 'Smith' ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name, email FROM customers WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name, created_at FROM customers WHERE created_at BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT c.first_name, c.last_name, p.preference_name, p.preference_value FROM customers c INNER JOIN preferences p ON c.customer_id = p.customer_id WHERE p.preference_name = 'theme_color';

SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT c.customer_id) AS total_customers, SUM(p.preference_value) AS total_preferences FROM customers c LEFT JOIN preferences p ON c.customer_id = p.customer_id WHERE p.preference_name = 'notification_preference';
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customers;
SELECT customer_id, phone_number FROM customers ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM preferences WHERE preference_value = 'active';
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM campaigns WHERE targeted_customers > 1000;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customers WHERE birthdate BETWEEN '1990-01-01' AND '1995-12-31';
SELECT c.customer_id, c.first_name, p.preference_name, p.preference_value FROM customers c JOIN preferences p ON c.customer_id = p.customer_id;

SELECT c.first_name, c.last_name, c.birthdate, cam.campaign_name, cam.start_date, cam.end_date FROM customers c JOIN preferences p ON c.customer_id = p.customer_id JOIN campaigns cam ON p.preference_name = cam.campaign_name;
SELECT c.first_name, c.last_name, c.email, cam.campaign_name FROM customers c LEFT JOIN campaigns cam ON c.customer_id = cam.targeted_customers;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customers WHERE city = 'New York';
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name, COUNT(*) AS order_count FROM customers JOIN orders ON customers.customer_id = orders.customer_id GROUP BY customer_id, first_name, last_name;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE price <= 50.00 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT preference_type, preference_value FROM preferences ORDER BY preference_type ASC, preference_value DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE city='New York' ORDER BY last_name ASC
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name, email FROM customers WHERE city='Los Angeles' AND first_name='John'
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name, email, phone_number FROM customers WHERE city='Chicago' OR city='Dallas'
SELECT c.customer_id, c.first_name, c.last_name, o.order_date, o.total_amount FROM customers c JOIN orders o ON c.customer_id = o.customer_id WHERE c.city='Seattle'

SELECT p.product_id, p.product_name, p.price, c.first_name, o.order_date FROM products p JOIN orders o JOIN customers c ON o.customer_id = c.customer_id WHERE c.city='Miami' ORDER BY o.order_date DESC
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, phone_number FROM customers WHERE birth_date > '1990-01-01';
SELECT customer_name, join_date FROM customers ORDER BY join_date DESC;
SELECT city, state, postal_code FROM customer_addresses WHERE customer_id = 3;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, phone_number, join_date FROM customers ORDER BY join_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, street_address, city, state, postal_code FROM customers JOIN customer_addresses ON customers.customer_id = customer_addresses.customer_id;
SELECT orders.order_id, customers.customer_name, orders.total_amount FROM customer_orders AS orders JOIN customers ON orders.customer_id = customers.customer_id ORDER BY orders.total_amount DESC;

SELECT customers.customer_name, products.favorite_product, products.wishlist_status FROM customers JOIN product_preferences AS products ON customers.customer_id = products.customer_id WHERE products.wishlist_status = TRUE;
